div.div:
Scale-To-Zero
- Removes subsets in Endpoints (hello-world-0001-private)
- Removes endpoints and ports from EndpointSlice (hello-world-0001-private)
- Updates deployment to replicas=0
- Deletes the pods
- Updates PodAutoScaler status to "Unknown/NoTraffic"
- Updates serverlessService numActivators to -1 and updates its status to "NoHealthyBackends/K8S Service is not ready"
- Updates the status of the revision to "NoTraffic"

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
